text: Richard Earl "Dick" Locher (June 4, 1929 - August 6, 2017) was a cartoonist. He has made cartoons for lots of things, including the Chicago Tribune. He has also made cartoons for Life, Time, Newsweek, U.S. News and World Report, Forbes, and the Congressional Record. He was born in Dubuque, Iowa. Locher died of Parkinson's disease on August 6, 2017 in Naperville, Illinois, aged 88. ==References== Category:Pulitzer Prize winners Category:American cartoonists Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Dubuque, Iowa
title: Dick Locher
